Description: Blue/green glazed steatite naoform amulet; at the front is an aperture through which the figure of a deity is visible beneath two sun-discs and a cornice of uraei(chipped); the other three sides are decorated with open-work representations of the head of Khons; pierced suspension ring on the top through which gold wire has been twisted.
Curator's comments: Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): p.97
